description.//1: Google advocates flat data by default unless necessary, and camelcase attribute naming.
description.//3: This file contains all possible result fields that a client can request.
description.//4: Each result field must define a path to its location in the UniProtEntry object, using json-path notation
description.//5: Note: field_map.json is redundant now that field paths are defined.

searchFields.label: Gene Ontology [GO]
searchFields.description: search go term with evidence. If evidence is not consider term is go. If evidence is considered such as iea, the term is go_iea
